text: Maia Perez (born October 19, 1999) is an American professional soccer player. She is a goalkeeper. She was drafted by Angel City FC in the United States' National Women's Soccer League. They sent her to play in France for a few years. She is the starting goalkeeper for Grand Paris Seine Ouest 92 Issy (GPSO 92 Issy) at the age of 23. == Early life == Perez grew up in East Kentwood, Michigan. She started to play soccer in the 2nd grade. She was the goalkeeper when playing with the boys in her elementary school. == Career == Perez began playing division 1 soccer for the Hartford Hawks in her freshman year. She was in college for 5 years. Perez began playing with Angel City FC in Los Angeles, CA, USA in March of 2022. She currently plays with Grand Paris Seine Ouest 92 Issy (GPSO 92 Issy). In 2023 she started playing for OL Reign of Seattle. == References == Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2023 Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football goalkeepers Category:American soccer players
title: Maia Perez
